author: Source: Greenwich Citizen
title: Danbury library STEAM fair offers fun and learning - Greenwich Citizen
text:
Alec Astorino, 9, launches a marshmallow with Danbury Savings Bank employee Jason Arrowitz at the Mad Hackers STEAM fair held at the Danbury Library on Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015.
